identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a hostel food app that feels like a modern D2C brand, not a government portal.
principles: Fusion: UberEats visual appeal + Notion functional density
Emotion: Food is joy, waste is sad. Use color to guide behavior.
Zoom In: High-quality food textures to make meals desirable.

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 shadow-sm transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-50 shadow-sm
buttons.accent: bg-orange-500 text-white hover:bg-orange-600 shadow-md hover:shadow-lg transition-all

cards.base: bg-white border border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200 rounded-xl overflow-hidden

inputs.base: h-11 bg-white border-slate-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-orange-500/20 focus:border-orange-500 transition-all

status_badges.booked: bg-green-100 text-green-700 border border-green-200 px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium
status_badges.pending: bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-700 border border-yellow-200 px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium
status_badges.closed: bg-slate-100 text-slate-600 border border-slate-200 px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is slate-900 on white, or white on slate-900. Avoid grey-on-grey.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings (orange-500) on all interactive elements.

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use grids.
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a high-utility app. Focus on speed and clarity. The 'Book Meal' flow must be under 3 clicks. The Admin Dashboard must be dense but readable (Bento grid). Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections. Do not use placeholders.
